com.ixortalk.udini.android.sdk

Interface UdiniCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UdiniCallbackAdapter

    public interface UdiniCallback
    This is the interface that is called by the Udini SDK, effectively allowing clients to be updated of changes in state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onUdiniDeviceActionFailed(UdiniBadge badge, UdiniDevice device, UdiniAction action, UdiniException error)
      Called when the action execution for a device has failed.
      void onUdiniDeviceActionSucceeded(UdiniBadge badge, UdiniDevice device, UdiniAction action)
      Called when the action execution for a device has succeeded.
      void onUdiniDeviceInCooldown(UdiniDevice device, long remainingTimeMillis)
      The Udini SDK reports a device entering a cooldown period whenever communication with that device has successfully ended.
      void onUdiniDeviceInvokeOnProximityWillStart(UdiniBadge badge, UdiniDevice device)
      Reports that the execution of an automatic invoke-on-proximity action was started.
      void onUdiniDeviceStateChange(UdiniBadge badge, UdiniDevice device, UdiniAction action, UdiniDeviceState state)
      Reports a change in state associated with the device.

      Called when login has failed.

      Called when login was successful.

      Called when login has failed.

      • onUdiniServiceFailed

        void onUdiniServiceFailed(UdiniException exception)
        Called when the Udini service has failed for some reason.
        See Also:
        UdiniApp.start()

      • onUdiniLoginRequired

        void onUdiniLoginRequired()
        Indicates the SDK attempted to execute a request to the server but login is required in order to continue.
        See Also:
        UdiniApp.login(Context)

      • onUdiniLoginSuccessful

        void onUdiniLoginSuccessful()
        Called when login was successful.
        See Also:
        UdiniApp.login(Context)

      • onUdiniLoginFailed

        void onUdiniLoginFailed(UdiniException exception,
                        int errorCode)
        Called when login has failed.
        Parameters:
        exception - the cause of the failure
        errorCode - a code identifying the type of error
        See Also:
        UdiniApp.login(Context)

      • onUdiniLogoutSuccessful

        void onUdiniLogoutSuccessful()
        Called when logout was successful.
        See Also:
        UdiniApp.logout(Context)

        void onUdiniLogoutFailed(UdiniException exception)
        Called when login has failed.
        Parameters:
        exception - the cause of the failure
        See Also:
        UdiniApp.logout(Context)

      • onUdiniStartedScanningDevices

        void onUdiniStartedScanningDevices(java.util.List<UdiniDevice> devices)
        Called when the Udini BLE Component has started scanning a list of devices.
        Parameters:
        devices - a list of all devices that are included in the BLE scanning
        See Also:
        UdiniApp.start(boolean)

      • onUdiniStoppedScanningDevices

        void onUdiniStoppedScanningDevices(java.util.List<UdiniDevice> devices)
        Called when the Udini BLE Component has stopped scanning a list of devices.
        Parameters:
        devices - a list of all devices that were included in the BLE scanning
        See Also:
        UdiniApp.stop()

      • onUdiniScanFailed

        void onUdiniScanFailed(int errorCode)
        Called when scanning for Bluetooth devices has failed for some reason. When this method is called there will most likely be an issue with the internal Bluetooth state of the Android device, and a restart will be required.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - a code identifying the type of error

      • onUdiniDiscoveredDevice

        void onUdiniDiscoveredDevice(UdiniDevice device)
        Called when the Udini BLE Component did discover a BLE device.
        Parameters:
        device - the device that describes the BLE device that has been discovered

      • onUdiniLostDevice

        void onUdiniLostDevice(UdiniDevice device)
        Called when the Udini BLE Component reports a BLE device no longer being in range.
        Parameters:
        device - the device that describes the BLE device that has been lost
        See Also:
        UdiniOptions.rangeTimeoutMillis()

      • onUdiniDeviceInCooldown

        void onUdiniDeviceInCooldown(UdiniDevice device,
                             long remainingTimeMillis)
        The Udini SDK reports a device entering a cooldown period whenever communication with that device has successfully ended. During cooldown the SDK will not attempt to automatically connect with the device. Once the cooldown is over the device will be treated as normal.
        Parameters:
        device - the device that describes the BLE device in cooldown
        remainingTimeMillis - the time in milliseconds the device will stay in cooldown
        See Also:
        UdiniOptions.coolDownPeriodMillis()

      • onUdiniDeviceStateChange

        void onUdiniDeviceStateChange(UdiniBadge badge,
                              UdiniDevice device,
                              UdiniAction action,
                              UdiniDeviceState state)
        Reports a change in state associated with the device. This callback is called when connecting and/or communicating with the device.
        Parameters:
        device - the device for which the state has changed
        action - the action context for which the state change occurred
        state - the new state

      • onUdiniDeviceActionSucceeded

        void onUdiniDeviceActionSucceeded(UdiniBadge badge,
                                  UdiniDevice device,
                                  UdiniAction action)
        Called when the action execution for a device has succeeded. This includes automatic actions for which there is no UdiniAction instance.
        Parameters:
        device - the device for which the action succeeded
        action - the action that was executed, null in case of an automatic action

      • onUdiniDeviceActionFailed

        void onUdiniDeviceActionFailed(UdiniBadge badge,
                               UdiniDevice device,
                               UdiniAction action,
                               UdiniException error)
        Called when the action execution for a device has failed. This includes automatic actions for which there is no UdiniAction instance.
        Parameters:
        device - the device for which the action failed
        action - the action that was executed, null in case of an automatic action

      • onUdiniDeviceInvokeOnProximityWillStart

        void onUdiniDeviceInvokeOnProximityWillStart(UdiniBadge badge,
                                             UdiniDevice device)
        Reports that the execution of an automatic invoke-on-proximity action was started.
        Parameters:
        device - the device for which the action started
